name: AloeNeem Ayur Soap
Significance: Use regularly to get bacterial free body
details: It is a perfect solution if you want germ free plus hydrated body. The soap is made up of Aloe Vera which helps in cleansing the body and Neem fights against germs.

name: Gram Face Pack
prodOneLine: Do not just eat Gram seeds but use them for Glow!
Significance: Best for dry skins and instant glow
details: Gram Face Pack consists of proceeded gram seeds, rose water, oil,coffee extract. Apply the pack on face and keep it for 10 mins. Then gently wipe your face with damp cloth. Use twice a week.

name: Ayur Serum
Significance: Get rid of acne, black heads and opens pores
details: Apply at night so that skin heals quickly. Apply 2-3 drops only.

name: Onion Extract Shampoo
prodOneLine: Nourishes scalp with Onion rich proteins
Significance: Avoids hairfall and improves hair growth
details: Organic forest hundres percent vegan and black seed oil. Shampoo for women and men.

name: Almond oil
prodOneLine: Use almond oil when creating your personal care formulation to keep your skin healthy smooth and soft
details: This transparent oil is ideal for soaps, candles, vapourisers, lotions and diffusers. Craft with oils and natural creativity

name: Jasmine Hair Gel
details: Moisture rich gel that provides defined look while taming hair leaving a high shine and finish.

name: Mix fruit hair spray
prodOneLine: Super hold finishing and styling hair spray
details: Leaves hair looking natural and shining while imparting strength and volume.

name: pH Balanaced Wash
prodOneLine: Unique pH balance formula of lactic acid
Significance: Vaginal hygiene with pH 3.5 and above
details: The best defense against any vaginal discomfort.

name: After Shave Gel
